      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Same as OperationCallable.futureCall(Object, ApiCallContext), with a null context.
      abstract OperationFuture<ResponseT,​MetadataT> OperationCallable.futureCall​(RequestT request, ApiCallContext context)
      Initiates an operation asynchronously.
      OperationFuture<ResponseT,​MetadataT> OperationCallable.resumeFutureCall​(String operationName)
      Creates a new OperationFuture to watch an operation that has been initiated previously.
